title: Does anyone else has problems with the pbe launcher?
body: After clicking 'launch' the whole launcher is just freezing, the 'solution' thats given doesn't work to. Any ideas?

replies.body: If the patcher seems to freeze after selecting launch, then a security setting might be blocking the client from loading.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)  guide in case the location the PBE is located might be blocking that access.  Hopefully, that does the trick!
